verses.text: \w Save|strong="H3467"\w* me, O \w God|strong="H0430"\w*, by thy \w name|strong="H8034"\w*, and \w judge|strong="H1777"\w* me by thy \w strength|strong="H1369"\w*.\f + \fr 54.1 \ft chief…: or, overseer\f*\f + \fr 54.1 \ft Maschil: or, of instruction\f*
\w Hear|strong="H8085"\w* my \w prayer|strong="H8605"\w*, O \w God|strong="H0430"\w*; give \w ear|strong="H0238"\w* to the \w words|strong="H0561"\w* of my \w mouth|strong="H6310"\w*.

For \w strangers|strong="H2114"\w* are risen \w up|strong="H6965"\w* against me, and \w oppressors|strong="H6184"\w* \w seek|strong="H1245"\w* after my \w soul|strong="H5315"\w*: they have not \w set|strong="H7760"\w* \w God|strong="H0430"\w* before them. \w Selah|strong="H5542"\w*.
Behold, \w God|strong="H0430"\w* \add is\add* mine \w helper|strong="H5826"\w*: the \w Lord|strong="H0136"\w* \add is\add* with them that \w uphold|strong="H5564"\w* my \w soul|strong="H5315"\w*.

He shall \w reward|strong="H7725"\w* \w evil|strong="H7451"\w* unto mine \w enemies|strong="H8324"\w*: cut them \w off|strong="H6789"\w* in thy \w truth|strong="H0571"\w*.\f + \fr 54.5 \ft mine…: Heb. those that observe me\f*

I will \w freely|strong="H5071"\w* \w sacrifice|strong="H2076"\w* unto thee: I will \w praise|strong="H3034"\w* thy \w name|strong="H8034"\w*, O \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*; for \add it is\add* \w good|strong="H2896"\w*.

For he hath \w delivered|strong="H5337"\w* me out of all \w trouble|strong="H6869"\w*: and mine \w eye|strong="H5869"\w* hath \w seen|strong="H7200"\w* \add his desire\add* upon mine \w enemies|strong="H0341"\w*.
